revised_title: On Zoological Names and Homological Interpretations of Brain Commissures in Marsupialia and Monotremata
tldr: The author responds to Prof. Owen's paper on zoological names and homological interpretations, discussing the differences in brain commissures and cerebral hemispheres in Marsupialia and Monotremata compared to other mammals. The author argues that these differences are significant and should be recognized in anatomical research.
